languages.text: "Ангел — это старый колдун, что являлся мне и грозил смертью? Он промыл вам всем мозги? Или во главе у вас кто-то еще?"
"This 'angel' — is that the old sorcerer who appeared before me and promised my demise? Did he brainwash you all? Or is someone else leading you?"
languages.original_text: "Ангел — это старый колдун, что являлся мне и грозил смертью? Он промыл вам всем мозги? Или во главе у вас кто-то еще?"

traits.locale_text: "This 'angel' — is that the old sorcerer who appeared before me and promised my demise? Did he brainwash you all? Or is someone else leading you?"
"This 'angel' — is that the old man who appeared before me and promised my demise?"
"This 'angel' — is that the old sorcerer who appeared before me and promised my demise? Did he brainwash you all? Or is someone else leading you?"
"This 'angel' — is that the old man who appeared before me and promised my demise?"
"This 'angel' — is that the old sorcerer who appeared before me and promised my demise? Did he brainwash you all? Or is someone else leading you?"
"This 'angel' — is that the old man who appeared before me and promised my demise?"
"This 'angel' — is that the old sorcerer who appeared before me and promised my demise? Did he brainwash you all? Or is someone else leading you?"
"This 'angel' — is that the old sorcerer who appeared before me and promised my demise? Did he brainwash you all? Or is someone else leading you?"

languages.text: «Ese "ángel"... ¿es el viejo hechicero que apareció ante mí para prometerme la perdición? ¿Es que os ha lavado el cerebro a todos, o seguís las órdenes de alguna otra persona?».
languages.original_text: "This 'angel' — is that the old sorcerer who appeared before me and promised my demise? Did he brainwash you all? Or is someone else leading you?"

traits.locale_text: «Ese "ángel"... ¿es el viejo hechicero que apareció ante mí para prometerme la perdición? ¿Es que os ha lavado el cerebro a todos, o seguís las órdenes de alguna otra persona?».
«Este "ángel"... ¿es el anciano que apareció ante mí para prometerme la perdición?».

languages.text: 「その『天使』というのは…{mf|俺|私}の前に現れて死を言い渡したソーサラーのことか？そいつがお前たちを洗脳したのか？それとも他の誰かに指示されているのか？」
languages.original_text: "This 'angel' — is that the old sorcerer who appeared before me and promised my demise? Did he brainwash you all? Or is someone else leading you?"

traits.locale_text: 「その『天使』というのは…{mf|俺|私}の前に現れて死を言い渡したソーサラーのことか？そいつがお前たちを洗脳したのか？それとも他の誰かに指示されているのか？」
「その『天使』というのは…{mf|俺|私}の前に現れて死を言い渡した老人のことか？」

languages.text: “这个所谓的‘天使’，就是那个出现在我面前，说我难逃一死的老巫师吗？他是把你们所有人都洗脑了吗？还是说，有什么别的东西在指引你们？”
languages.original_text: "This 'angel' — is that the old sorcerer who appeared before me and promised my demise? Did he brainwash you all? Or is someone else leading you?"

traits.locale_text: “这个所谓的‘天使’，就是那个出现在我面前，说我难逃一死的老巫师吗？他是把你们所有人都洗脑了吗？还是说，有什么别的东西在指引你们？”
“这个所谓的‘天使’，就是那个出现在我面前，说我难逃一死的老人吗？”

languages.text: "Dieser 'Engel' ... ist das der alte Hexer, der mir erschienen ist und meinen Niedergang versprochen hat? Hat er Euch alle einer Gehirnwäsche unterzogen? Oder lenkt euch jemand anderes?"
languages.original_text: "This 'angel' — is that the old sorcerer who appeared before me and promised my demise? Did he brainwash you all? Or is someone else leading you?"

traits.locale_text: "Dieser 'Engel' ... ist das der alte Hexer, der mir erschienen ist und meinen Niedergang versprochen hat? Hat er Euch alle einer Gehirnwäsche unterzogen? Oder lenkt euch jemand anderes?"
"Dieser 'Engel', ist das der alte Mann, der vor mir erschienen ist und meinen Niedergang versprochen hat?"

languages.text: « Cet "ange" dont vous parlez, c'est le vieux sorcier qui m'est apparu pour m'annoncer ma chute ? Il vous a tous lavé le cerveau ou quelqu'un d'autre tire les ficelles dans l'ombre ? »
languages.original_text: "This 'angel' — is that the old sorcerer who appeared before me and promised my demise? Did he brainwash you all? Or is someone else leading you?"

traits.locale_text: « Cet "ange" dont vous parlez, c'est le vieux sorcier qui m'est apparu pour m'annoncer ma chute ? Il vous a tous lavé le cerveau ou quelqu'un d'autre tire les ficelles dans l'ombre ? »
« Cet "ange" dont vous parlez, c'est le vieil homme qui m'est apparu pour m'annoncer ma chute ? »
